news.title: FSFE joins April in disagreement on Microsoft education agreement

body.p: FSFE joins April in their disagreement with the new agreement between Microsoft and the French Minister of Education. Full text of press release with list of participating organisations (in French).

body-complete.h1: FSFE joins April in disagreement on Microsoft education agreement
body-complete.p: FSFE joins April in their disagreement with the new agreement between Microsoft and the French Minister of Education. Full text of press release with list of participating organisations (in French).
